English
Bully prison warden Bill Boss, leading a big state prison in the US of A, has a lot of
problems; his prison statistically has the highest amount of prison riots, medical costs
and staff turnover in the country. But foremost he is unable to get the respect he thinks
he deserves from his inmates and the state Governor. He constantly fails in experimenting
with different ideas for the ideal punishment to get the inmates in line, which drives
him, together with the sizzling heat, completely insane. Under threats of termination by
the Governor, his loyal right hand man Dwight comes up with a brilliant idea.
A revolutionary idea which could change the American prison system for good and save
billions of dollars. An idea based on the notorious Human Centipede movies, that will
literally and figuratively get the inmates on their knees, creating the ultimate
punishment and deterrent for anyone considering a life of crime. Having nothing to lose,
Bill and Dwight create a jaw-dropping 500-person...
